text: I've used Notion, Monday, Asana and Trello—some with clients, some internally—and my favorite by far is ClickUp. It has all the functionality of the others combined.  Much of our work is a bit siloed, so I haven't worked on passing tasks between boards, but you can definitely "inherit" setup functionality across boards.
